author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Clean up the use of parameters in building V17 geometry of HGCal

#### PR validation:

Use overlap script to check no overlaps for all V17 components

title: Phase2-hgx312X Clean up the use of parameters in building V17 geometry of HGCal
